data.message:
Dear facebook,

Why cant i go live anymore and also upload videos it appears someone reported me nun of my videos are explicit or indecent i need you guys to sort this out. Thank you

replies.message: Hi Kelvin. It's possible that your account was blocked due to member feedback our team received. Keep in mind that blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days and that we can't lift this block for any reason. -Jordan
Thank you and i understand but they are wicked people who report you unnessarily so i am asking facebook to have a system in place for reports like these that are fake.
